LanguageData.alaestor_teleporting_Research_tier_1_0.d: Manipulation of static interdimensional conduits through space-time.
LanguageData.alaestor_teleporting_Research_tier_2_0.d: Manipulation of dynamic interdimensional conduits through space-time.
LanguageData.alaestor_teleporting_Research_tier_4_0.d: Mastery of manipulating space-time. Unlocks the ability for colonists to use the teleport console for site-to-site transports.
